abstract.p: Eltek ASA, Norwegian power supply company, will buy Power Conversion Products of US for about $330 million in stock; deal brings together two suppliers of power to Internet and telecommunications industries; Alain Angelil controls 46.8 percent of company's shares; graph (S)

block.p: Eltek A.S.A., a Norwegian power supply company, said it would buy Power Conversion Products of the United States for about $330 million in stock. The deal brings together two suppliers of power to the Internet and telecommunications industries. After the merger the new company would derive nearly 40 percent of its revenue from the United States. Eltek's founder, Alain Angelil, controls 46.8 percent of the company's shares, and the merger is subject to his endorsement.
